00020 TTemplate::TTemplate(const std::string& det,int refine,int trigger_polarity, bool debug):
00021   fDebug(debug),
00022   fConverged(false),
00023   fTotalPulses(0),
00024   fRefineFactor(refine),
00025   fTriggerPolarity(trigger_polarity),
00026   fChannel(det),
00027   fTemplatePulse(NULL){
00028        // Setup the error hist
00029        std::string error_histname = "hErrorVsPulseAdded_" + fChannel.str();
00030        std::string error_histtitle = "Plot of the Error as each new Pulse is added to the template for the " + fChannel.str() + " channel";
00031        int n_bins = 10000;
00032        fErrors = new TH1D(error_histname.c_str(), error_histtitle.c_str(), n_bins,0,n_bins);
00033 }

00044 void TTemplate::AddPulse(double x_offset, double y_scale, double y_offset, const TH1D* hPulse){
00045 
00046   if (fDebug) {
00047     std::cout << "TTemplate::AddPulse(): # pulses = " << fTotalPulses << std::endl;
00048   }
00049 
00050   double template_pedestal = fTemplatePulse->GetBinContent(1);
00051   double total_error=0;
00052 
00053   // Loop through the pulse histogram
00054   for (int iPulseBin = 1; iPulseBin < hPulse->GetNbinsX(); ++iPulseBin) {
00055 
00056     // First, get the corrected sample value based on the fitted parameters
00057     double uncorrected_value = hPulse->GetBinContent(iPulseBin);
00058     double corrected_value = uncorrected_value - y_offset;
00059     corrected_value /= y_scale;
00060     corrected_value += template_pedestal;
00061 
00062     // Get the corrected bin number based on the fitted time offset We add 0.5
00063     // so that we round to the nearest integer and then subtract time offset
00064     // because this value might not want to go directly into the template
00065     int bin_number = iPulseBin + 0.5 - x_offset; 
00066 
00067     // Only change the bin contents of bins within the range of the template histogram
00068     if (bin_number < 1 || bin_number > fTemplatePulse->GetNbinsX()) {
00069       continue;
00070     }
00071 
00072     // Store the old bin content and error for later
00073     double old_bin_content = fTemplatePulse->GetBinContent(bin_number);
00074     double old_bin_error = fTemplatePulse->GetBinError(bin_number);
00075 
00076     // Calculate the new bin content...
00077     double new_bin_content = fTotalPulses * old_bin_content + corrected_value;
00078     new_bin_content /= (fTotalPulses + 1);
00079 
00081     double new_bin_error = ((fTotalPulses - 1)*old_bin_error*old_bin_error)
00082                          + (corrected_value - old_bin_content)*(corrected_value - new_bin_content);
00083     new_bin_error = std::sqrt(new_bin_error / fTotalPulses);
00084 
00085     // increment total error
00086     total_error+=new_bin_error;
00087 
00088     if (fDebug) {
00089       cout << "TemplateCreator::AddPulseToTemplate(): Bin #" << bin_number 
00090            << ": Corrected Sample Value = " << corrected_value << endl
00091            << "\t\t\tOld Value (Error) = " << old_bin_content << "(" << old_bin_error << ")" << endl
00092            << "\t\t\tNew Value (Error) = " << new_bin_content << "(" << new_bin_error << ")" << endl;
00093     }
00094 
00095     // Set the new bin content and error of the template
00096     fTemplatePulse->SetBinContent(bin_number, new_bin_content);
00097     fTemplatePulse->SetBinError(bin_number, new_bin_error);
00098   }
00099 
00100   // increment the total number of pulses
00101   ++fTotalPulses;
00102 
00103   // fill the error histoo
00104   fErrors->Fill(fTotalPulses, total_error);
00105 }
00106 
00107 bool TTemplate::CheckConverged(){
00108   if(fConverged) return true;
00109 
00110   // Check the difference between this iteration and previous ones and, if it's small, the template has converged
00111   int n_bins_to_check = 10;
00112   if (fTotalPulses<n_bins_to_check) return false;
00113   double convergence_limit = 0.1;
00114   int newest_bin=fErrors->FindBin(fTotalPulses);
00115   double error=fErrors->GetBinContent(newest_bin)/fTotalPulses;
00116   for (int iPrevBin = 0; iPrevBin < n_bins_to_check; ++iPrevBin) {
00117     double previous_error = fErrors->GetBinContent(newest_bin-iPrevBin);
00118     previous_error /= fTotalPulses- iPrevBin;
00119 
00120     if ( std::fabs(previous_error - error) > convergence_limit) {
00121        fConverged=false;
00122        break;
00123     } else{
00124        fConverged=true;
00125     }
00126   }
00127 
00128   return fConverged;
00129 }
00130 
00131 void TTemplate::Normalise(){
00132     if(!fTemplatePulse) return;
00133 
00134     // Normalise the template so that it has pedestal=0 and amplitude=1
00135     // Work out the pedestal of the template from the first 5 bins
00136     int n_bins_for_template_pedestal = 5;
00137     double total = 0;
00138     for (int iBin = 1; iBin <= n_bins_for_template_pedestal; ++iBin) {
00139       total += fTemplatePulse->GetBinContent(iBin);
00140     }
00141     double template_pedestal = total / n_bins_for_template_pedestal;
00142    
00143     // Subtract off the pedesal
00144     for (int iBin = 1; iBin <= fTemplatePulse->GetNbinsX(); ++iBin) {
00145       double old_value = fTemplatePulse->GetBinContent(iBin);
00146       double new_value = old_value - template_pedestal;
00147 
00148       fTemplatePulse->SetBinContent(iBin, new_value);
00149     }
00150 
00151     // Integrate over the histogram and scale to give an area of 1
00152     // Want the absolute value for the integral because of the negative
00153     // polarity pulses
00154     double integral = std::fabs(fTemplatePulse->Integral()); 
00155     fTemplatePulse->Scale(1.0/integral);
00156 }
00157 
00158 double TTemplate::GetPedestal()const{
00159   return fTemplatePulse->GetBinContent(1);
00160 }
00161 
00162 double TTemplate::GetTime()const{
00163   if(fTriggerPolarity>0) return fTemplatePulse->GetMaximumBin()-1;
00164   return fTemplatePulse->GetMinimumBin()-1;
00165 }
00166 
00167 double TTemplate::GetAmplitude()const{
00168   if(fTriggerPolarity>0) return fTemplatePulse->GetMaximum() - GetPedestal();
00169   return GetPedestal() - fTemplatePulse->GetMinimum();
00170 }
